alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 5:23AM EST until December 15 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulation from a trace to up to one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Fluvanna and Western Louisa Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light rain will begin this evening, with a changeover to freezing rain expected overnight as temperatures drop to freezing or slightly below. Temperatures are expected to warm above freezing by late morning or around noon Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.
